email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out with a freight offer for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. We were hoping for something in the mid-40s. Can you check if the owner is open to negotiating? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s specifications and any demurrage terms? Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I’ve discussed with the owner, and they’re willing to come down to $48.50 per metric ton. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, built in 2018, and fully compliant with all regulations. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 is closer to our target. However, we’d like to push for $47.00. Also, can we confirm the laytime is 72 hours total? Lastly, could you provide the vessel’s full specs and any recent inspection reports? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve managed to secure $47.25 per metric ton, which is the owner’s final offer. Laytime is confirmed at 72 hours total. I’ve attached the vessel’s full specs and the latest inspection report. Let me know if we can proceed. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $47.25 works for us. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star for the Houston to Rotterdam shipment. Please send over the charter party for review. Thanks for your help on this. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll prepare the charter party and send it over by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
